oilIsDense.#Comment: Should oil be dense and drag entities down?

enableRfEngine.#Comment: Enable the RF to MJ engine?

enableMjDynamo.#Comment: Enable the MJ to RF dynamo / engine / generator?

enable.#Comment: Should any oil spouts or lakes be generated at all?

excessiveBiomes.#Comment: Biome registry names (e.g. 'minecraft:ocean','minecraft:plains') of biomes that should have GREATLY increased oil generation rates.

excludedBiomes.#Comment: Biome registry names (e.g. 'minecraft:hell','minecraft:jungle') of biomes that should never generate oil.

excludedBiomesIsBlacklist.#Comment: If true then the excluded biomes list will be treated as a blacklist, otherwise it will be treated as a whitelist.

excludedDimensions.#Comment: Dimension ID's (e.g. 'minecraft:the_nether' for the nether,'minecraft:the_end' for the end) of dimensions that should never generate oil.

excludedDimensionsIsBlacklist.#Comment: If true then the excluded dimenstions list will be treated as a blacklist, otherwise it will be treated as a whitelist.

generationRate.#Comment: The rate of occurrence of oil wells.

oil_desert_biome.#Comment: Should Oil Desert biomes generate at all?

oil_ocean_biome.#Comment: Should Oil Ocean biomes generate at all?

large.#Comment: The percentage probability of a large oil spawn

medium.#Comment: The percentage probability of a medium oil spawn

small.#Comment: The percentage probability of a small oil spawn

enable.#Comment: Whether oil spouts are generated or not. The oil spring at the bottom of large lakes will still exist.

large_max_height.#Comment: The maximum height for large oil spouts

large_min_height.#Comment: The minimum height for large oil spouts

small_max_height.#Comment: The maximum height for small oil spouts

small_min_height.#Comment: The minimum height for small oil spouts

surfaceDepositBiomes.#Comment: Biome registry names (e.g. 'minecraft:ocean','minecraft:hills') of biomes that should have slightly increased oil generation rates.
